InvoiceNumber.description: A unique identification of the Invoice.

InvoiceIssueDate.description: The date when the Invoice was issued.

InvoiceTypeCode.description: A code specifying the functional type of the Invoice.

InvoiceCurrencyCode.description: The currency in which all Invoice amounts are given, except for the Total VAT amount in accounting currency.

VATAccountingCurrencyCode.description: The currency used for VAT accounting and reporting purposes as accepted or required in the country of the Seller.

ValueAddedTaxPointDate.description: The date when the VAT becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer in so far as that date can be determined and differs from the date of issue of the invoice, according to the VAT directive.

ValueAddedTaxPointDateCode.description: The code of the date when the VAT becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer.

PaymentDueDate.description: The date when the payment is due.

BuyerReference.description: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.

ProjectReference.description: The identification of the project the invoice refers to.

PurchaseOrderReference.description: An identifier of a referenced purchase order, issued by the Buyer.

SalesOrderReference.description: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

ReceivingAdviceReference.description: An identifier of a referenced receiving advice.

DespatchAdviceReference.description: An identifier of a referenced despatch advice.

TenderOrLotReference.description: The identification of the call for tender or lot the invoice relates to.

InvoicedObjectIdentifier.description: An identifier for an object on which the invoice is based, given by the Seller.

BuyerAccountingReference.description: A textual value that specifies where to book the relevant data into the Buyer's financial accounts.

PaymentTerms.description: A textual description of the payment terms that apply to the amount due for payment (Including description of possible penalties).

InvoiceNoteSubjectCode.description: The subject of the textual note in BT-22.

InvoiceNote.description: A textual note that gives unstructured information that is relevant to the Invoice as a whole.
